name: Claytorial
overview:
Claytorial is designed to aid companies get their companyâ€™s message across in a fun and easy to understand way. We help people understand complicated things by creating easily understood, how-to videos for any practice or concept.

The process is this: we create a visual map of your idea, using drawings. Then we bring the drawings to life as moving images in a video sketch. The Delivery? We Claytorialize! Your complicated thing is now simple to understand. â€˜We Help People Understand Complicated Things!â€™

The best way to understand Claytorial is to take a look at the Claytorial video we created for tagga, a recently launched startup.
